data.eml:eml: Mygalomorph spiders from southwestern Oregon, USA, with descriptions of four new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cokendolpher, James C., Peck, Robert W., Niwa, Christine G. (2005): Mygalomorph spiders from southwestern Oregon, USA, with descriptions of four new species. Zootaxa 1058: 1-34, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170130
